DialogueOption.Text: Launch codes? I got them already.
Use the ship log to set destinations. I know, I know!

Dialogue.Page: Uh.. no? Smoke get to your head or something? I wanted to ask you to check in on Gabbro's ship sometime.

I'm pretty certain their ship's antenna is busted or something, because its position ain't registering on our radars. And uh, I shouldn't have to say this, but it's a problem if those expensive hunks of alloys and wood just fly off into the void.

I radioed Gabbro and told them to go repair it, but from the sound of it I'm pretty certain their ship ain't even on the same island they're on anymore. And I know better than asking them to swim out and look for it.
So uh, just fly around Giant's Deep sometime and look for it, will ya? Repair it if you can. I just need to know it hasn't exploded yet. Thanks!
Woah, woah, calm down!<Pause/> Geez, hatchling.
Uh, I dunno why you woke up from your nap so cranky, but if it's cool with you - I wanted to ask you to check in on Gabbro's ship sometime.

I'm pretty certain their ship's antenna is busted or something, because its position ain't registering on our radars. And uh, I shouldn't have to say this, but it's a problem if those expensive hunks of alloys and wood just fly off into the void.

I radioed Gabbro and told them to go repair it, but from the sound of it I'm pretty certain their ship ain't even on the same island they're on anymore. And I know better than asking them to swim out and look for it.
Just fly around Giant's Deep sometime and look for it, maybe repair it if you can. I just need to know it hasn't exploded yet.
You wanna grab a marshmallow stick, cool your nerves a bit before you take off? <Pause/>Just take it easy, hatchling.
